item.title: US Stocks Picked
item.description: MPW (Medical Properties Trust, Inc.) Small Medical Properties Trust is showing progress in its plan to recover, but faces risks related to earnings and tenant troubles. IBRX (ImmunityBio, Inc.) Small ImmunityBio shows promise with positive developments in clinical trials and FDA review, but faces risks associated with regulatory processes and industry competition
